data.actual_result: The border will flash between white and its normal color every couple of seconds
data.expected_result: The client border should stay as its normal color.
data.short_description: Trying to change to a application window mid screen sharing makes the client border flash white
data.steps_to_repro: - Get in a call with another person - Start screensharing and choose entire screen - Go to screensharing options and select change windows - Go to the application window tab - Observe
